item.description:
Machievellis is an awesome social spot. 1 floor 3 spots. Bar, patio and dance floor. With a kitchen serving food up to 11pm and a DJ playing Top 40, Hip Hop, Reggae, Dance from 9pm to close. This place is probably my favorite spot in Southington when it comes to friday night bar nights. I'll be at K Gee's Burgers next door at 9 (right when the kitchen closes).

Jim has an event at Friends Cafe down the street. It starts at 9. Theres a band playing over there. Actually his cousin will be performing so go down and show some support. If you feel like staying at Friends for the night, thats cool. Machievelli's is just an another event option to bar hop to if you like.... See you all in Southington. Tonight should be fun!

Christian
item.how_to_find_us: we'll be in the dance area or the bar sude where the DJ is. Or call me @ (860) 357 -7264
item.name: Machievelli's
